org.jetel.data.formatter.provider

Class FixLenDataFormatterProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.formatter.provider.FixLenDataFormatterProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FormatterProvider

    public class FixLenDataFormatterProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements FormatterProvider
    Provides support for getting the lixlen data formatter.
